scenes.description: Transition and intro for the next song.

subtitles.original: 冷めないで夢の世界　もっと飛び跳ねていたい
subtitles.english: Don't let it end, this world of dreams... I want to keep hopping around even more

subtitles.original: みんな行くよ！ジャンプ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, here we go! Jump!

subtitles.original: 今ファンタスティック　奇跡のマジック
subtitles.english: Now it's Fantastic, a magic of miracles

subtitles.original: 驚いて笑って泣いて聞いて
subtitles.english: Be surprised, laugh, cry, and listen

subtitles.original: ABC見せればエンターテイメント
subtitles.english: If I show you the ABCs, it's entertainment

subtitles.original: 見つかる夢のチケット
subtitles.english: Finding the ticket to our dreams

subtitles.original: 明日はまた世界は輝くよ
subtitles.english: Tomorrow the world will shine again

subtitles.original: 君次第さ　さぁ、踊ろう
subtitles.english: It's up to you, now let's dance

subtitles.original: イメージしてみてごらん
subtitles.english: Just try to imagine it

subtitles.original: 空も飛べるはずだよ
subtitles.english: We should even be able to fly in the sky

subtitles.original: 君がいるこの世界は
subtitles.english: In this world where you are,

subtitles.original: 愛が溢れる
subtitles.english: it's overflowing with love.

subtitles.original: 今年も！無事！
subtitles.english: This year too! I was able to safely!

subtitles.original: お誕生日！迎えられたよ！
subtitles.english: Celebrate my birthday!

subtitles.original: みんなのおかげだ！
subtitles.english: It's all thanks to everyone!

subtitles.original: 本当に本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you so, so much!

subtitles.original: 今ファンタスティック　奇跡のマジック
subtitles.english: Now it's Fantastic, a magic of miracles

subtitles.original: 今ファンタスティック　奇跡のマジック
subtitles.english: Now it's Fantastic, a magic of miracles

subtitles.original: 今ファンタスティック　奇跡のマジック
subtitles.english: Now it's Fantastic, a magic of miracles

subtitles.original: 希望を見せて明日へと駆け抜けて
subtitles.english: Show me hope and run toward tomorrow

subtitles.original: So Dreaming　集めているイメージは
subtitles.english: So Dreaming, the images I'm gathering are

subtitles.original: 鮮やかな夢のドレス
subtitles.english: a bright dress of dreams

subtitles.original: 明日はまた世界は輝くよ
subtitles.english: Tomorrow the world will shine again

subtitles.original: 君次第さ　さぁ、踊ろう
subtitles.english: It's up to you, now let's dance

subtitles.original: 気になって
subtitles.english: I'm curious

subtitles.original: もっと私を見て　もっと
subtitles.english: look at me more, more

subtitles.original: 恩返しは愛のこもった
subtitles.english: My way of giving back is with a love-filled

subtitles.original: 投げキッスで
subtitles.english: blown kiss

subtitles.original:
ファンサ
作詞・作曲 HoneyWorks
subtitles.english:
Fansa
Lyrics & Composition: HoneyWorks

subtitles.original: 黄色い声援　目が合ってるよ
subtitles.english: Yellow cheers, our eyes are meeting

subtitles.original: ハート作って　恋しちゃってください
subtitles.english: Make a heart and please fall in love with me

subtitles.original: やれること　何でもします
subtitles.english: I'll do anything I can

subtitles.original: 神対応で虜にしちゃう
subtitles.english: I'll captivate you with god-tier fan service

subtitles.original: エゴサで見つけたアンチの声
subtitles.english: The voices of antis I found while ego-searching

subtitles.original: ふざけんな　誰より分かってるし
subtitles.english: Don't mess with me, I know better than anyone

subtitles.original: でも大丈夫　ここに立てば
subtitles.english: But it's okay, if I stand here,

subtitles.original: みんながいる
subtitles.english: everyone is here

subtitles.original: 行くよー！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: 君に会って　もっと私を見て　もっと
subtitles.english: Meeting you, look at me more, more

subtitles.original: 恩返しは愛のこもった投げキッスで
subtitles.english: My way of giving back is with a love-filled blown kiss

subtitles.original: 虜にする　もっと夢を見せる　もっと
subtitles.english: I'll captivate you, show you more dreams, more

subtitles.original: 楽しませて　愛のこもったスペシャルな曲
subtitles.english: Let me entertain you with a love-filled special song

subtitles.original: もっともっと！楽しく叫んでねー！
subtitles.english: More, more! Shout happily!

subtitles.original: お手紙も　書いてください
subtitles.english: Please write me letters too

subtitles.original: 何度も読んで　宝物にします
subtitles.english: I'll read them over and over and make them my treasure

subtitles.original: スキャンダル　まだ早いけど
subtitles.english: Scandals, it's still too early but

subtitles.original: 裏切りません　宣言しときまーす
subtitles.english: I won't betray you, I'll declare it now

subtitles.original: 執拗な嫌がらせには負けない
subtitles.english: I won't lose to persistent harassment

subtitles.original: ふざけんな　実力で勝ってやる
subtitles.english: Don't mess with me, I'll win with my own strength

subtitles.original: だからやめない　負けず嫌い
subtitles.english: So I won't stop, the sore loser

subtitles.original: 私がいる
subtitles.english: me is here

subtitles.original: 行くよー！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: 拳上げて　もっと汗をかいて　もっと
subtitles.english: Raise your fists, sweat even more, more

subtitles.original: 恩返しは愛のこもった声掛けで
subtitles.english: My way of giving back is with love-filled chants

subtitles.original: 大歓声　もっと　まだまだね　もっと
subtitles.english: Loud cheers, more, not enough yet, more

subtitles.original: 受け止めてね　愛のこもったワガママソング
subtitles.english: Please accept it, a love-filled selfish song

subtitles.original: 終わりが近づく　寂しいね
subtitles.english: The end is near, it's lonely, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 楽しいのに　泣きそうだよ
subtitles.english: Even though it's fun, I feel like crying

subtitles.original: 次も　次も　また会えるよね
subtitles.english: Next time, and the time after that, we can meet again, right?

subtitles.original: 約束！
subtitles.english: Promise!
